DOC.brief_summary: Early feasibility study evaluate safety function Edwards Lifesciences CardiAQ™ Transcatheter Mitral Valve
DOC.brief_title: Edwards Lifesciences CardiAQ™ Transcatheter Mitral Valve Replacement ( TMVR ) Early Feasibility Study
DOC.detailed_description: The study multi-center , prospective , single-arm , non-randomized study design evaluate safety function Edwards Lifesciences CardiAQ™ Transcatheter Mitral Valve Transfemoral Transapical Delivery Systems .
DOC.criteria: Clinically significant , symptomatic mitral regurgitation High risk openheart surgery Meets anatomical criterion Unsuitable anatomy Prohibitively high risk
